NAME: Partth Mahajan
ABOUT:
Currently, I work as an Investment Banking Analyst at JP Morgan covering the Mergers and Acquisitions space (M&A) for Consumer & Retail sector.  

Prior to this, I have worked as a Consultant in Financial Due Diligence, Transactions Advisory Services at EY M&A for Americas Region. Sectors covered included Oil & Gas, Consumer Product & Retail, TMT and Aviation. 

I was recently awarded with lifetime membership of Beta Gamma Sigma - International Honour Society for AACSB accredited B schools for high scholastic achievement in my MBA programme at IMT Ghaziabad. 

I was amongst the top 2 candidates to be selected as summer interns from campus at Goldman Sachs Securities Division in Bangalore and worked across different products (EQ, FICC, Credit) and regions in Strategy & Management Team. 

As a member of Senior Placement Committee at IMT G, I developed and maintained long term relationships with industries/industry personnel. Along with a team of 18 students, I also managed placements and internship of fellow students and explored opportunities for maintaining strategic alliance with corporates through guest lectures, live projects etc. 

Prior to my MBA, I interned with Institutional Banking Services, Development Bank of Singapore (DBS) and Taxation and Regulatory Services, PwC. I had always striven for excellence and thus was felicitated as the 'Star student in BFSI sector' by Union Finance Minister in 2014 during my graduation at Shaheed Sukhdev College of Business Studies, University of Delhi.
